channel.title: [REQUEST]How do you change a servers inventory/chat box lookout?[REQUEST]
channel.description:
Ok i was looking at someones server in BETA STAGE and its got a cool chatbar and its fullscreen in 317
Heres a pic http://i617.photobucket.com/albums/tt254/drdanielfc/001.jpg ( copy and paste into address bar obviously) How can i get my client to have a chatbox like this?? i would like a transparent box like in runescape hd I would like to know how to Get fullscreen for 508 and a cool chatbox for 508 not 508 HD
Can anyone help??
THANKS!!
P.S i did not make the client in tht picture i did not make non of it credits to who ever made it

item.title: [REQUEST]How do you change a servers inventory/chat box lookout?[REQUEST]
item.dc:creator: @Andy89898 Andy89898
item.description:
@Andy89898 wrote:

yh but tht dont tell me how to make the chatbar transparent WHAT JAVA FILE HOLDS THE chatbox with the colour cream then i change it to transparent

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST]How do you change a servers inventory/chat box lookout?[REQUEST]
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Transparency has been implemented in jdk6_u13 (iirc)
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/awt/Transparency.html

Read full topic
